thread.title: Paddy McGuinness 'hopes for a wedding' as new Take Me Out series is announced
thread.title_full: Paddy McGuinness 'hopes for a wedding' as new Take Me Out series is announced

title: Paddy McGuinness 'hopes for a wedding' as new Take Me Out series is announced
text:
Paddy McGuinness 'hopes for a wedding' as new Take Me Out series is announced RETURN: Take Me Out is coming back for another series next year 
Reported by Vickie Scullard 5 comments 
TAKE Me Out will return for a new series next year. 
ITV's ever popular Saturday night dating show, hosted by Bolton comic Paddy McGuinness , will return early next year for 10 episodes, along with ITV2's hit sister show, Take Me Out: The Gossip, presented by Mark Wright and Laura Jackson. Your Vote Would you appear on Take Me Out to find love? 
Yes: 
91% 
Thanks for voting - this ballot is now closed 
Series eight of the show will aim to continue its success rate of five engagements, four weddings and two bouncing babies. 
Paddy said: "We witnessed some unusual twists of fate during the last series which proves the Take Me Out love lift works in mysterious ways. I'm looking forward to all the dates to come and with 2016 being a leap year, I'm curious to see if our Flirty Thirty have any surprises in store that might lead to another wedding â€” fingers crossed." Promoted Stories
